issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Ardashir II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap; covered korymbos; two ribbons commencing to the left below the lorymbos, pointing upwards, pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing above ball of hair, pointing upwards, earing consisting of two elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; double row of pearls running the shoulders to the breast ornament (the latter not visible); dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h l. o. mzdysn bgy 'rthštr-MRKAn MRKA 'ry'n W 'nyr'n MNW ctry MN yzd'n| mazdēsn bay Ardašir  šāhān šāh Ērān ud Anērān kē čihr az yazdān|"The Mazda-worshiping divine Ardashir, King of Kings of the Iranians and non-Iranians, whose seed (image|splendour) is from the gods";
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; on the shaft l'st, to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; above bust with elaborate coiffure to the right, surrounded by flames, to the left and right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Ardashir II, holding a barson with both hands, both figures facing inwards; dotted border
issue_references_s: SNS 3  Mint V = ART Type Ia/3b
